# dokploy_compose (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `project_id` (String)

### Optional

- `auto_deploy` (Boolean)
- `compose_file_content` (String)
- `compose_path` (String)
- `custom_git_branch` (String)
- `custom_git_ssh_key_id` (String)
- `custom_git_url` (String)
- `deploy_on_create` (Boolean)
- `server_id` (String) Server ID to deploy the compose stack to. If not specified, deploys to the default server.
- `source_type` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
